item.title: A Practical Use Case for Higher Order Functions
item.description: Have you ever encountered this scenario before? Lets say you have a class User. case class User(firstName: String, lastName: String, address: String) You’re using this class in production to store information retrieved from an endpoint. Now imagine you are given a new task where you need to fetch a User from a new endpoint. However, This endpoint does not contain the address field, you’ll have to get that field from a second new endpoint.
